Membership Categories
Attractive Memberships To Fit Your Lifestyle
The Bayou Club offers a variety of memberships, all with no food and beverage minimums plus no assessments guaranteed. Memberships include equal privileges for spouse/domestic partner and unmarried children under the age of 23 living at home. Below are the membership categories offered:
Full Golf
Full Golf Members enjoy all of The Bayou Club's first-class amenities including championship golf on our private Tom Fazio Signature course, tour-quality practice facilities with unlimited range balls, 14 Har-Tru clay and hard tennis courts plus 6 dedicated pickleball courts lighted for evening play, 24-hour fitness center, swimming pool, beautiful clubhouse, dining and a full year-round social calendar with events and activities for the entire family as well as business associates and friends.
Intermediate Golf (age 30-39)
Intermediate Golf Members enjoy all of the same member benefits as Full Golf Members.
Young Professional Golf (age 29 & under)
Young Professional Golf Members enjoy all of the same member benefits as Full Golf Members.
Social-Sport
Social-Sport Members enjoy The Bayou Club's first-class amenities including 14 Har-Tru clay and hard tennis courts plus 6 dedicated pickleball courts lighted for evening play, 24-hour fitness center, swimming pool, beautiful clubhouse, dining and a full year-round social calendar with events and activities for the entire family as well as business associates and friends. Social-Sport Members have access to tour-quality practice facilities and limited golfing privileges of 6 times annually, with payment of applicable cart and green fees
(restrictions apply)
.
Social-Tennis
Social-Tennis Members enjoy The Bayou Club's first-class amenities including 14 Har-Tru clay and hard tennis courts plus 6 dedicated pickleball courts lighted for evening play, swimming pool, beautiful clubhouse, dining and a full year-round social calendar with events and activities for the entire family as well as business associates and friends. Social-Tennis Members have access to tour-quality practice facilities and limited golfing privileges of 6 times annually, with payment of applicable cart and green fees
(restrictions apply)
.
Social-Fitness
Social-Fitness Members enjoy The Bayou Club's first-class amenities including the 24-hour fitness center, swimming pool, beautiful clubhouse, dining and a full year-round social calendar with events and activities for the entire family as well as business associates and friends. Social-Fitness Members have access to tour-quality practice facilities and limited golfing and tennis privileges of 6 times annually, with payment of applicable cart and green fees or court fees
(restrictions apply)
.
Social
Social Members enjoy The Bayou Club's first-class amenities including the beautiful clubhouse, swimming pool, dining and a full year-round social calendar with events and activities for the entire family as well as business associates and friends. Social Members have access to tour-quality practice facilities and limited golfing and tennis privileges of 6 times annually, with payment of applicable cart and green fees or court fees
(restrictions apply)
.
For more information and to schedule your complimentary Member Preview Experience, please contact:
Brad Stevens, PGA   Membership Director
727.399.1000 x316
[email protected]
Click Here to Request Membership Information

Special Events & Meetings
The Perfect Venue for All of Your Special Events
Whether you are planning a charity fundraiser, corporate meeting or birthday celebration, The Bayou Club is the premier event venue in Pinellas County.
Located just minutes from the beaches and a short drive from St. Pete and Tampa, our private Clubhouse features the elegant Main Ballroom with seating for up to 200 guests and the adjacent outdoor terrace overlooking the scenic 9th and 18th holes. For a more intimate setting, the Formal Dining Room can seat up to 60 guests and features scenic views and a cozy fireplace. T
he stately Boardroom is the ideal venue for smaller corporate meetings featuring AV equipment and complimentary Wi-Fi, which is available throughout the clubhouse.
The Bayou Club's highly skilled staff will assist with all the arrangements for your group.
The Bayou Club offers affordable, all-inclusive meeting and event packages with personalized menus for any size budget. From continental breakfasts, brunch or lunch buffets to all occasion cocktail hours to formal sit-down dinners. Our outstanding Chef Emmett can prepare a wide range of menu selections including hors d'oeuvres, carving stations, buffets, sit-down dinners and fantastic desserts.
The Bayou Club's first-class amenities, delicious cuisine, along with our professional staff will ensure that your event is sure to be both memorable and successful.
For more information or to schedule a tour, please contact:
Janina Krawcyzk, Catering Sales Director
727.399.1000 x 361
[email protected]
You do not have to be a Member of the Club to host a private event.
Click Here to Request Event Information

Membership Information
Membership at The Bayou Club
"Thank you for encouraging me to jump right into this weekend's Member-Member golf tournament. I've only been a Member for a week, but I now feel like I've been a Member here for years. The welcome I received from all of the staff and Members has made me feel right at home. I can't believe my partner and I even won the tournament! It's not winning that I will remember, but instead the many friendships I developed so quickly. The Bayou Club is not just a quality golf course and country club, but also a group of warm and friendly people. I look forward to many more years as a Member."
- Pat Stoker, Bayou Club Member
Nestled in the heart of Pinellas County,
The Bayou Club
is a family-friendly private country club where Members play championship golf on the legendary Tom Fazio Signature course featuring new CHAMPION Dwarf Bermudagrass Greens ~ the best putting surface available found on 12 PGA Tour venues including Pinehurst No. 2. In addition to outstanding championship golf, Members enjoy tour quality practice facilities, tennis, swimming, 24-hour fitness and a social calendar filled with activities and events for the entire family.
Golf  Range Tennis  Pickleball  Swim  Fitness  Social
ASK ABOUT THE SPECIAL INTRODUCTORY MEMBERSHIP
All-Inclusive Membership for the Entire Family
All Bayou Club Memberships include club privileges for spouses/domestic partners and children under 23 years old living at home or attending school. Unlike many other private clubs in the area, at the Bayou Club Members never pay assessments or food and beverage minimums.
Enjoy First-Class Private Club Amenities
Award-Winning Tom Fazio Signature Course ~ The Only Fazio Design in Pinellas County
Tour-Quality Practice Facilities with Unlimited Range Balls for Golf Members
PGA Professional Instruction
Active Men's & Women's Golf Associations
Legendary Harry Hopman Tennis Center featuring 14 Har-Tru Clay & Hard Courts
New Pickleball Center Featuring 6 Dedicated Lit Courts Plus 4 Non Lit Courts, a Fully-Stocked Pro Shop & More
24-Hour Private Fitness Center with Personal Training
Upscale, Casual & Scenic Outdoor Patio Dining
Full Social Calendar with Year-Round Events & Activities
Swimming Pool & Aquatics Program
Outstanding Golf, Tennis & Swim Junior Programs and Camps
Special Events & Meeting Spaces ~ Complimentary Room Rental for Members
Reciprocal Member Privileges at Florida Golf Trail Clubs
The Club offers a wide range of membership options, many of which are particularly attractive to young professionals and families with children.
Click Here to View the Bayou Club's Membership Categories
Become a Member of The Bayou Club
We invite you to visit the Club and experience the benefits of membership firsthand. To schedule your complimentary Member Preview Experience and learn more about the Bayou Club's attractive memberships, please contact:
Brad Stevens, PGA  Membership Director
727.399.1000 x316
[email protected]
Click Here to Request Membership Information

Dining & Events
Dine, Mix and Mingle at the Club
The Bayou Club’s Members enjoy casual and upscale dining options and a full social calendar filled with events and activities for all ages.
View Member Events>
The Bayou Club Grill
The Grill is perfect place to socialize with fellow Members, entertain business colleagues at a private table, or relax on the adjacent outdoor patio with spectacular course views. The Grill offers a full menu of Chef Emmett's delicious cuisine plus great happy hour specials at the full bar. Members enjoy weekly specials including Burgers & Brews Night and themed dinners.
View Lunch Menu>
View Dinner Menu>
The Formal Dining Room
For a more upscale and intimate dining experience, The Formal Dining Room accommodates up to 60 guests and features a cozy fireplace and scenic views. Members enjoy complimentary room rental for private events. The Formal Dining Room is host to special Member events such as the popular monthly Wine Dinners, featuring wines from around the world and a regional five-course meal.
The Main Dining Room
The Clubhouse features the elegant Main Dining Room which can accommodate up to 200 guests ~ the perfect venue for weddings, charity events, corporate meetings and more. Members enjoy complimentary room rental for this event venue.
The Main Dining Room is host to major Member events, including the festive Holiday Party, Mother’s Day Brunch and the Member favorite Wednesday Night Pot of Gold featuring a special menu each week and great prize drawings.

Weddings & Bridal Events
Plan Your Dream Wedding at The Bayou Club
Nestled in the heart of Pinellas County just minutes from the beaches and a short drive from Tampa, the Bayou Club is the perfect venue for the wedding of your dreams.
Whether you are planning a bridal shower for 30 or a wedding for 200 guests, the Club's professional staff will assist you with every detail to make it memorable.
Surrounded by beautiful landscapes and scenic golf course and water views, The Bayou Club features an outdoor ceremony site and elegant Main Ballroom with floor to ceiling windows, an outdoor terrace with panoramic views, and a bridal suite and groom's room for you and your bridal party.
The Bayou Club's staff is experienced in hosting a wide range of bridal events including:
Bridal Showers
Luncheons
Bachelor Golf Outings
Rehearsal Dinners
Wedding Ceremonies & Receptions
Post Wedding Brunches
Anniversary Celebrations
The Bayou Club provides a wide range of all-inclusive wedding packages simplifying the planning process for you. We take pride in delivering excellence to our clients at an affordable price and will work with you to create the perfect package that fits your needs and budget.
Let us create the perfect blend of sophistication, elegance and warmth to match your personality and style.
For more information or to schedule a tour, please contact:
Janina Krawcyzk, Catering Sales Director
727.399.1000 x 361
[email protected]
You do not have to be a Member of the Club to host a private event.
Click Here to Request Event Information
Read all of our wedding reviews on our
Bayou Club
Storefront at
